title: Add a listing to your watchlist with options
description: Adds a listing to the authenticated user's watchlist with the option to control when and if an email is sent to the member warning that the auction is closing soon.
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

fields.name: ListingId
fields.description: The ID of the listing to add to the watchlist.

fields.name: EmailOption
fields.description: The amount of time before the auction closes to email the member.

fields.name: SaveEmailOption
fields.description: Indicates whether to save the email preference as the member's default choice.

fields.name: ReferringSearchQueryId
fields.description: The search query ID for the search which referred the user to the listing.

returns.description: <WatchListResponse> Details on whether the operation succeeded.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.
